entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 40 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 through mainland inlets and valleys early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
